attributes.action: Replace the House of Lords with House of the People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let proposals of House of Commons be scrutinised by the People whom they are intended to benefit - instead of hereditary peers (by accident of birth), life peers (by untrusted ministerial appointment) or bishops (of a single religion). Members to be chosen at random, 2 from each constituency from volunteers sought on Electoral Roll.  The result would be reasonably representative of gender, classes, races and religions. Replace one fifth every few years (say five?).  Pay them for time in the House plus expenses.  Leaders and champions would emerge.
